data.title: Attention All Vendors
data.description:
Attention All Vendors Using Our Ecommerce Platform,

Please Be Informed That There Will Be Scheduled Maintenance On Our Website On 1st May,2025 From 9:00

AM To 12:00 PM. During This Period, Access To The Vendor Dashboard And Other Related Services Will Be

Temporarily Unavailable.
We Apologize For Any Inconvenience This May Cause And Appreciate Your Understanding.
